    • Field Detail

      • share

        java.util.Map<PersonModel,java.util.Map<PersonModel,java.math.BigDecimal>> share
        Amount per person to be payed to any other participant. key -> PersonModel value -> map where the key is a PersonModel to whome money are owned and the value is an amount

      • getBalancePerPerson

        public java.util.Map<PersonModel,java.math.BigDecimal> getBalancePerPerson()
        Balance per participant based on the average amount. Negative balance means the person owns money. Positive balance means the person payed too much.

      • shareBoardTotal

        public void shareBoardTotal()
        Calculate amount of debt to share. Produces 2 dimensional array where column header represents a creditor and row header represents a debtor. Ex.: given the balance for total amount 180 with average 60: Jane=50, Anna=-60, John=10 | | Jane | Anna | John | | Jane | 0 | 0 | 0 | | Anna | 50 | 0 | 10 | | John | 0 | 0 | 0 | Ann owes 50 to Jane and 10 to John
